com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

Class ClassTemplate<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection.ClassTemplate<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CBClassTemplate, NMSClassTemplate, PacketType

    public class ClassTemplate<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses reflection to transfer/copy all the fields of a class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassTemplate()
      Initializes a new ClassTemplate not pointing to any Class
      Call setClass to define the Class to use
      ClassTemplate(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Initializes a new ClassTemplate pointing to the Class specified

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> ClassTemplate<T> create(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)

      If something fails, an empty instance is returned

      Attempts to create a new template for the class at the path specified.

      • newInstance

        public T newInstance()
        Gets a new instance of this Class, using the empty constructor
        Returns:
        A new instance, or null if an error occurred/empty constructor is not available
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this ClassTemplate has no (valid) Class set

      • newInstanceNull

        public T newInstanceNull()
        Gets a new instance of this Class without calling the Class Constructors. Calling this method will result in a new instance with all fields set to the default. That is, all fields will have 'NULL' values, or for primitives, 0/false/etc.
        Returns:
        a new Class Instance, or null upon failure
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this ClassTemplate has no (valid) Class set

      • isInstance

        public boolean isInstance(java.lang.Object object)
        Checks whether a given object is an instance of the class represented by this Template
        Parameters:
        object - to check
        Returns:
        True if the object is an instance, False if not

      • isAssignableFrom

        public boolean isAssignableFrom(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks whether the specified clazz object can be assigned to the type represented by this ClassTemplate. This template taken as A, and clazz as B, this is equivalent to:
        B instanceof A
        Parameters:
        clazz - to check
        Returns:
        True if the clazz can be assigned to this template type, False if not

      • isType

        public boolean isType(java.lang.Object object)
        Checks whether the object class equals the class represented by this Template
        Parameters:
        object - to check
        Returns:
        True if the object is a direct instance, False if not

      • isType

        public boolean isType(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks whether a given class instance equals the class represented by this Template
        Parameters:
        clazz - to check
        Returns:
        True if the clazz is not null and equals the class of this template

      • create

        public static ClassTemplate<?> create(java.lang.String path)
        Attempts to create a new template for the class at the path specified. If the class is not found, a proper warning is printed.
        Parameters:
        path - to the class
        Returns:
        a new template, or null if the template could not be made

        Returns:
